channel.title: FRAPS not recording
channel.description: I use FRAPS to record my videos, and I get the little yellow FPS numbers at the top, but when I press my record hotkey, nothing happens. I've tried changing the hotkey, and I get nothing. The first day I re-installed it, it was working fine. Now it just doesn't. I've checked the folder it saves the clips to, and it doesn't add anything.

item.title: FRAPS not recording
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

It worked when I used a registered Minecraft key, F5.
Odd.

Read full topic

item.title: FRAPS not recording
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Cole1497:

Nope. It acts as if I’ve never pressed it, although Runescape will react to my f1-f12 commands (I use F5).

Try it with some other random keys on your keyboard that minecraft does not use and see if you can get any results.

Read full topic

item.title: FRAPS not recording
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

does the yellow turn to red like it should? I had the problem of black video while still recording all sound on my desktop (it still does that), and i have yet to find a fix for that.

Read full topic
